pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, November 22, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Ontario, the Honourable Doug Ford.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to gather in the third floor foyer no later than 10:30 a.m.
